Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - There is no failure of any pipe, fitting, or other pipeline component, and
○ There is no visible leakage at any joint or fitting.
○ The volume of water bled off (ΔV) is less than the calculated ΔV(max allowable air), and

○ The test has been extended to 90 minutes and the pressure has not dropped more than 20 kPa below the rebound peak value after 60 minutes.

○ When pit is located on a slope of 10 to 30 degrees, the lid shall be flush with ground on the upper side.
○ When slope is greater than 30 degrees, the lid shall be up to 100mm above the ground level on the upper side.
